title: [一人一投訴信] 香港人去澳洲機場入境，道閘機竟然講蝗語，投訴完仲要寸咀話無得改！

replies.msg:
(廢話少講,
下面有email template 投訴,
同埋幫手推twitter!!!!!!!!)


首先, 香港89%人口講廣東話，得1.9%係講蝗語！！！

Twitter 手足 "heunggongyan1" 去澳洲過關聽到道閘機講蝗語火撚滾, 佢 send 咗 email 去投訴澳洲邊境部隊但對方寸咀懶理!

https://twitter.com/drewpavlou/status/1204912043041665025?s=21





https://twitter.com/heunggongyan1/status/1205094639029506048


澳洲邊境部隊回覆原文，寸撚到！






__Send 去依度兩個email: __

[url]eligibility@ABF.gov.au[/url]

[url]sgeligibility@ABF.gov.au[/url]


_Template 如下:_

To whom it may concern,

We are writing as a group of concerned Hong Kong citizens regarding an issue with Australia's Smartgate passport control system. When Hong Kong passport holders pass through Smartgates at the Australia border, the machines default to using Mandarin.

This set up is not acceptable to Hong Kong travelers. While Chinese is the official language in Hong Kong, only 1.9% of our population use Mandarin. The rest of the population use Cantonese and English. The Australian Border Force should not be lumping Hong Kong citizens under China simply because of the issuing country code on our passports is “CHN”.

It is worth noting that the issuing authority on Hong Kong passports is "HONG KONG SPECIAL ADMINISTRATIVE REGION" and that Hong Kong passports are biometric. There should be sufficient information contained in Hong Kong passports for Smartgates to read and determine what language should be used.

Australia is a democratic country and we do not wish to see it partakes in erasing Hong Kong's identity and the Cantonese language; this is what the Chinese Communist Party wants.

Hong Kong is Australia’s 9th largest tourism market. Australia is also the second most popular education destination for Hong Kong students, sending thousands of students to Australia and generating significant revenues for the education sector.

We strongly urge Department of Home Affairs and Australian Border Force to rectify this issue, and request that Hong Kong passports default to English or Cantonese when passing through Smartgates at Australia's airports.

We ask that you help in respecting and preserving our heritage.

Sincerely,
XXX
（記得改下款）

唔好俾佢地昆到 系統一定分到
我做地勤碌你地啲護照 即使係碌香港護照
佢出左CHN，但香港護照號碼係H或K開頭
例如K12345678咁 大陸果啲唔係用呢啲字
如果佢分唔到系統點樣識睇你洗唔洗簽證姐

利申，中學被逼學過半年煲冬瓜，仲要冇人用心上堂，半年之後家長會連署dispel, 真心一句都聽唔明。

quote.msg: 手足...如果你朋友有BNO；但過咗期就盡快續領番；如果係1997後出生嘅咁就唯有麻煩你朋友忍耐一吓...直至爭取到BNO平權及重開畀97後嘅手足們申請!!! 始終...廁板個 code 係CHN 同埋 Nationality 應該係寫支那，咁真係好難有得搞喎 (唔知有無錯...未曾攞過廁板)!!! BNO係用唔到澳洲嘅 eChannel(年頭喺澳洲試過)...但係廁板就可以!!! 如果要外國嘅 eChannel 轉用英文或者Cantonese..香港人就要認真考慮吓要有自己嘅Country Code囉!!!
